Package controller

Class TrainingCtrl

java.lang.Object
controller.TrainingCtrl
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class TrainingCtrl
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The training scene
The scene make a loop around every training component and for earch serie in them he show the weight and the number of repetition the user have to make. When a component he finish he ask to the user if he likes to make the exercise or not (The exercise mark will be impacted).
Version:
1.0
Author:
Vincent Mastain
